short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Hacker News icon that notifies you when the top story changes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays a Hacker News icon on your browser that changes color when the top story changes.

Source code at https://github.com/robbiewain/hack-the-news
